subject: Little League World Series
lead_paragraph: Shoto Totsuka and two relievers pitched a five-hitter and Hamamatsu City, Japan, eliminated Langley, British Columbia, 4-0, to advance at the Little League World Series.
snippet: Shoto Totsuka and two relievers pitched a five-hitter and Hamamatsu City, Japan, eliminated Langley, British Columbia, 4-0, to advance at the Little League World Series.
